name: Battle Tank Armada
description: Battle Tank Armata is a simulator of battle tanks where you can expect tests of courage and survival skills against army tank.. Destroy as many tanks! ake your score will be? it depends on you! good luck!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
